page.title: 02LANGUAGE ENGLISH AND WELSH
page.content: Twenty years ago there were more Welsh speaking people than English speaking people in Llanbrynmair.Now more English speaking people have come into our area to live.Forty children speak Welsh and thirty-four speak English at our school.The English children in our school are learning Welsh.Here is a sample of Welsh. "{Bore da}"means"Good morning","{Prynhawn da}"means "Good afternoon","{Nos da}"means"Good night" and"{Cymru am Byth}"means Wales for ever".For the English speaking people in our area there are learning classes for learning Welsh once per week.In my home I always speak Welsh with my father and mother,brother and sister.When letters or posters about the school activities are sent to the home they are always in English and Welsh.We are now trying to save the Welsh language from extinction.
